Title: Anime in Small Basic
Description: Anime is a tool to create animation program written in Microsoft Small Basic.  Anime outputs also SVG animation code.
HomeWiki:
Anime in Small Basic

Anime is a tool to create animation program written in Microsoft Small Basic. Anime outputs also SVG animation code.

This project is in very early stage. You can see the current status of this project in a thread of Small Basic forum How to Create Animation with Small Basic.
